Class JsonFormat.Features

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonFormat.Features
  • Enclosing class:
    JsonFormat

    public static class JsonFormat.Features
extends Object
    Helper class that encapsulates information equivalent to Boolean valued EnumMap.
